metadata.description: And/or Labs - Tools for B2B SaaS marketing and positioning analysis

plugins.name: positioning-grader
plugins.description: Analyzes B2B SaaS homepages against 42 positioning checks drawn from Dunford ('Obviously Awesome'), Fletch PMM (homepage teardowns), Moore ('Crossing the Chasm'), MECLABS (conversion heuristic), and Ries & Trout ('Positioning'). Scores 6 categories — Dunford Canvas, Fletch Questions, Moore Statement, MECLABS Heuristic, Competitive Framing, and Anti-Patterns — with full framework citations. Includes 2 commands: analyze (comprehensive .md export) and report (PDF summary).
